flavor: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

foreign_names.flavor: In der Natur wird kein Knochen und kein Fleischfetzen je verschwendet.
foreign_names.name: Aasfressender Schlamm
foreign_names.text: {G}: Schicke eine Karte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof ins Exil. Falls es eine Kreaturenkarte war, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf den Aasfressenden Schlamm und du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreign_names.flavor: En la naturaleza, ni un hueso ni un jirón de carne se desperdician.
foreign_names.name: Cieno carroñero
foreign_names.text: {G}: Exilia la carta objetivo de un cementerio. Si era una carta de criatura, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre el Cieno carroñero y gana 1 vida.

foreign_names.flavor: La nature ne gaspille pas un os, pas un bout de chair.
foreign_names.name: Limon nécrophage
foreign_names.text: {G} : Exilez une carte ciblée d'un cimetière. Si c'était une carte de créature, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur le Limon nécrophage et vous gagnez 1 point de vie.

foreign_names.flavor: In natura, non un solo ossicino o pezzo di carne viene sprecato.
foreign_names.name: Melma Mangiacarogne
foreign_names.text: {G}: Esilia una carta bersaglio da un cimitero. Se era una carta creatura, metti un segnalino +1/+1 sulla Melma Mangiacarogne e guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreign_names.flavor: 自然では、骨の一本、肉の一切れとて無駄にはならない。
foreign_names.name: 漁る軟泥
foreign_names.text: {G}：いずれかの墓地にあるカード１枚を対象とし、それを追放する。それがクリーチャー・カードである場合、漁る軟泥の上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置き、あなたは１点のライフを得る。

foreign_names.flavor: 자연은 뼈 한 조각, 살 한 점도 낭비하지 않는다.
foreign_names.name: 청소부 점액괴물
foreign_names.text: {G}: 무덤에 있는 카드 한 장을 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 추방한다. 추방한 카드가 생물 카드라면, 청소부 점액괴물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올리고 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreign_names.flavor: Na natureza, nem um único osso ou pedaço de carne é desperdiçado.
foreign_names.name: Lodo Necrófago
foreign_names.text: {G}: Exile o card alvo de um cemitério. Se era um card de criatura, coloque um marcador +1/+1 em Lodo Necrófago e ganhe 1 ponto de vida.

foreign_names.flavor: В природе ничего не пропадает без пользы — ни кость, ни клок мяса.
foreign_names.name: Трупоедная Слизь
foreign_names.text: {G}: изгоните целевую карту из кладбища. Если это была карта существа, положите один жетон +1/+1 на Трупоедную Слизь, и вы получаете 1 жизнь.

foreign_names.flavor: 在自然界中，没有半块骨头或半片肉会被浪费掉。
foreign_names.name: 腐食流浆
foreign_names.text: {G}：将目标牌从坟墓场放逐。如果它是生物牌，则在腐食流浆上放置一个+1/+1指示物，且你获得1点生命。

foreign_names.flavor: 在自然界中，沒有半塊骨頭或半片肉會被浪費掉。
foreign_names.name: 腐食流漿
foreign_names.text: {G}：將目標牌從墳墓場放逐。如果它是生物牌，則在腐食流漿上放置一個+1/+1指示物，且你獲得1點生命。

name: Scavenging Ooze
original_text: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: If the target card is an illegal target when the ability tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. No +1/+1 counter will be put on Scavenging Ooze and you won’t gain life. Notably, this means that if you activate Scavenging Ooze’s ability multiple times targeting the same creature card, only the first instance of the ability to resolve will have any effect.

text: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.
